article_title: Gavin Newsom: Jeb Bush’s ‘Stuff Happens’ Comment is Offensive
article_text: Connecting decision makers to a dynamic network of information, people and ideas, Bloomberg quickly and accurately delivers business and financial information, news and insight around the world.
